task.title: Adding labels or icons to a table

taskbody.prereq: The following steps assume that you have a table with a column displayed in the Editor area.
taskbody.context: This section explains how to add labels or icons to a table.

step.cmd: Select a label from the palette.
In the column, click an area immediately next to the item. Note that can you drop the label to the left or right of the item.
Complete the following steps as required:

choices.choice: To add a label: Enter a translation.
To add an icon: In the Presentation tab, browse for an icon.

taskbody.result: At runtime, the label or icon will be displayed on each detailed row.
